articles.author: Seung Min Kim
articles.title: Biden declares 'America will not default,' says he's confident of budget deal with GOP lawmakers - The Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — An optimistic President Joe Biden declared Wednesday he is confident the U.S. will avoid an unprecedented and potentially catastrophic debt default, saying talks with congressional Republicans  have been productive.
